title: Senior Accountant – Remote | Full-Time | $4/hr (U.S. Clients)
job_overview:
We’re seeking a Senior Accountant with over 3 years of experience handling bookkeeping and accounting for U.S. clients. The ideal candidate is proficient with QuickBooks, Xero, and NetSuite, and is comfortable working CST hours in a remote setting.

Key Responsibilities

- Handle day-to-day bookkeeping and full-cycle accounting for U.S. clients
- Reconcile accounts, prepare financial reports, and manage month-end closings
- Process A/P and A/R, manage invoices, and assist with payroll tasks
- Maintain accurate general ledgers and journal entries
- Use QuickBooks, Xero, and NetSuite to manage client books


Requirements

- 3+ years of experience working with U.S. clients in accounting/bookkeeping
- Proficiency in QuickBooks, Xero, and NetSuite
- Solid understanding of U.S. accounting principles (GAAP)
- Excellent English communication skills (written & verbal)
- Comfortable working full-time during Central Standard Time (CST) hours
- Bachelor’s degree in Accounting or related field (or equivalent experience)

Preferred
- CPA or relevant certification (a plus, not required)
- Experience in payroll processing
